column4: hello everyone!  I have been having a strange issue since I switched to ubuntu.  Many internet apps simply won't detect my internet connection, but most will.  Firefox is fine, Piggin is fine, nmap, ettercap, virtualbox, miro and many others work fine but I had to try several bittorrent clients before I could find one that worked, as well seemingly random apps just won't detect an internet connection.  Azereus wi

ll not see the net no matter what I do, nor will filezilla (yet deluge and gFTP work fine) or, worst of all, google earth as I have no alternative here.  Has anyone else experienced anything like this?
